Value.description: This plugin provides a symbols browser for your projects and code-completion inside the editor. Note: Only C/C++ language is supported by this plugin (currently)... See wiki at https://wiki.codeblocks.org/index.php/CB_Clangd_Client

Value.author: Yiannis An. Mandravellos (Modified for clangd by Pecan and AndrewCot)

Value.thanksTo: AndrewCot, ollydbg, sodev, Miguel Gimenez, BlueHazzard, MaxGaspa and all testers.
